sqlMap.select: select PROCESSMODELID, FLOW_ID, TASKNAME, OPINION, MORTGAGE_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, APPLICATION_TIME, ISSUED_TIME, SUPPORT_CATEGORY, SUPPORT_MONEY, RISK, PROCESSING_OPINION,CUST_NAME from T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELSIX where PROCESSMODELID=$processModelId$
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELSIX.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELSIX (PROCESSMODELID, FLOW_ID, TASKNAME, OPINION, MORTGAGE_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, APPLICATION_TIME, ISSUED_TIME, SUPPORT_CATEGORY, SUPPORT_MONEY, RISK, PROCESSING_OPINION,CUST_NAME) values (#processModelId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #flowId:VARCHAR#, #taskName:VARCHAR#, #opinion:VARCHAR#, #mortgageTime:VARCHAR#, #receiveTime:VARCHAR#, #applicationTime:VARCHAR#, #issuedTime:VARCHAR#, #supportCategory:VARCHAR#, #supportMoney:VARCHAR#, #risk:VARCHAR#, #processingOpinion:VARCHAR#,#custName:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update:
update T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELSIX set FLOW_ID = #flowId:VARCHAR#, TASKNAME = #taskName:VARCHAR#, OPINION = #opinion:VARCHAR#, MORTGAGE_TIME = #mortgageTime:VARCHAR#, RECEIVE_TIME = #receiveTime:VARCHAR#, APPLICATION_TIME = #applicationTime:VARCHAR#, ISSUED_TIME = #issuedTime:VARCHAR#, SUPPORT_CATEGORY = #supportCategory:VARCHAR#, SUPPORT_MONEY = #supportMoney:VARCHAR#, RISK = #risk:VARCHAR#, PROCESSING_OPINION = #processingOpinion:VARCHAR#, CUST_NAME=#custName:VARCHAR#
where PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId:DECIMAL:-9999#
sqlMap.select: select PROCESSMODELID, FLOW_ID, TASKNAME, OPINION, MORTGAGE_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, APPLICATION_TIME, ISSUED_TIME, SUPPORT_CATEGORY, SUPPORT_MONEY, RISK, PROCESSING_OPINION,CUST_NAME from T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELSIX where FLOW_ID=#flowId:VARCHAR# and TASKNAME=#taskName:VARCHAR#
